channel.title: 508 Customs
channel.description:
hey i was trying to add a custom godsword to my 508, i added other 2 godswords and they worked perfectly , when i added the ints to applet_sub1.java and added the .dat to model folder and compiled, i got no error. when i started playing and i spawned the item, the inventory look was perfect but when i weared it. my character went invincible. this is the int that i used.
case 1309: class19.aRSStringArray340[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Wear"); class19.anInt330 = 46169;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 1500;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 325;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = -1;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = -1;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 46169;//Male model id class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves class19.anInt387 = 46169;//female model id class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Barek's Godsword");//Item Name break;

item.title: 508 Customs
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

hey i was trying to add a custom godsword to my 508, i added other 2 godswords and they worked perfectly , when i added the ints to applet_sub1.java and added the .dat to model folder and compiled, i got no error. when i started playing and i spawned the item, the inventory look was perfect but when i weared it. my character went invincible.
this is the int that i used.

case 1309: class19.aRSStringArray340[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Wear"); class19.anInt330 = 46169;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 1500;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 325;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = -1;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = -1;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 46169;//Male model id class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves class19.anInt387 = 46169;//female model id class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Barek's Godsword");//Item Name break;
